 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּלָה‎</span> **verb** ==hang== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Assyrian Pi\`el <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***tullû***</u></abbr>, ***hang up***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***let down, dangle*** (a rope, etc.); Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְּלָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hang***; perhaps Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תלה‎</span> ***id.***, [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>386</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> in derived sense, ***be devoted, addicted, to***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> [[Gen.40.22|Gen 40:22]] +; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְתָלִ֫יתָ‎</span> [[Deut.21.22|Deut 21:22]] consecutive; 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּלוּ‎</span> [[Esth.8.7|Esth 8:7]]; [[Esth.9.14|Esth 9:14]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תלום‎</span> [[2Sam.21.12|2Sam 21:12]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תלא‎</span>), etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְלֵם‎</span> [[Josh.10.26|Josh 10:26]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּלֻהוּ‎</span> [[Esth.7.9|Esth 7:9]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִתְלוֺת‎</span> [[Ezek.15.3|Ezek 15:3]]; [[Esth.6.4|Esth 6:4]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֹּלֶה‎</span> [[Job.26.7|Job 26:7]] ***passive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּלוּי‎</span> [[Deut.31.23|Deut 31:23]] + 2 t., plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּלוּיִם‎</span> [[Josh.10.26|Josh 10:26]] — ***hang:*** 

**1.** ***hang up*** any object: accusative of hands and feet of slain, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלהַֿבְּרֵכָה‎</span> [[2Sam.4.12|2Sam 4:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּלוּי‎</span> of Absalom <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּאֵלָה‎</span> ***in the terebinth*** [[2Sam.18.10|2Sam 18:10]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> with accusative of thing, + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> [[Isa.22.24|Isa 22:24]]; [[Ezek.15.3|Ezek 15:3]]; [[Song.4.4|Song 4:4]]; [[Ps.137.2|Ps 137:2]] subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ עַלבְּֿלִימָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> [[Job.26.7|Job 26:7]]. 

**2.** specifically ***put to death by hanging***, with accusative of person [[Gen.40.22|Gen 40:22]]; [[Gen.41.13|Gen 41:13]] (both [[BDB#E|E]]), [[2Sam.21.12|2Sam 21:12]] (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תלא‎</span>), [[Esth.9.14|Esth 9:14]] absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּלוּי‎</span> [[Deut.21.23|Deut 21:23]] ***one hanged***; accusative of person + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלעֵֿץ‎</span> [[Gen.40.19|Gen 40:19]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Deut.21.22|Deut 21:22]]; [[Josh.8.29|Josh 8:29]]; [[Josh.10.26|Josh 10:26]] (twice in verse) (all [[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]), [[Esth.5.14|Esth 5:14]]; [[Esth.6.4|Esth 6:4]]; [[Esth.7.9|Esth 7:9]]; [[Esth.7.10|Esth 7:10]]; [[Esth.8.7|Esth 8:7]]; [[Esth.9.13|Esth 9:13]]; [[Esth.9.25|Esth 9:25]]. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׂרִים בְּיָדָם נִתְלוּ‎</span> [[Lam.5.12|Lam 5:12]] ***princes have been hung up by their hands; Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתָּלוּ עַלעֵֿץ‎</span> [[Esth.2.23|Esth 2:23]] ***they were hanged on a tree***; + 3 masculine singular with apocope <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתָּל‎</span> [[2Sam.18.9|2Sam 18:9]] (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיּתַֻּן‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נתן‎</span> **Hoph\`al**). **Pi\`el** ***hang up*** for display, with accusative of thing: ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּלּוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.27.10|Ezek 27:10]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> location), v[[Ezek.27.11|Ezek 27:11]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלאחוֺמוֺתַיִךְ‎</span>).
